resources.string: Thanks for stopping by, parents! NameOfTheGame is free to download and play. You can open up bonus content for even more fun by purchasing NameOfTheSoftCurrency and NameOfTheHardCurrency. To learn how to control in-app purchases, please visit the Help section. By playing the game, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the License Agreement in the store for this app and accept all of its terms.

Thanks for stopping by, parents! [Name of the game] is free to download and play. You can open up bonus content for even more fun by purchasing NameOfTheHardCurrency. To learn how to control in-app purchases, please visit the Help section. By playing the game, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the License Agreement in the store for this app and accept all of its terms.

Thanks for stopping by, parents! NameOfTheGame is free to download and play. You can open up bonus content for even more fun by purchasing NameOfTheSoftCurrency and NameOfTheHardCurrency. If thats not cool with you, you can control this kind of transaction for your kids simply by adjusting your device settings. Just like that, you have total control over what can or cant be bought in the game. Note that it is Gamelofts policy to put a cap on in-app purchases to prevent accidental or duplicate purchases.

Thanks for stopping by, parents! [Name of the game] is free to download and play. You can open up bonus content for even more fun by purchasing NameOfTheHardCurrency. If thats not cool with you, you can control this kind of transaction for your kids simply by adjusting your device settings. Just like that, you have total control over what can or cant be bought in the game.

"Passwords are a great way to make sure nobody but you can make in-app purchases on Google Play. Here are some quick steps to do this: - Go to Google Play >> Press the Menu Key >> Settings >> User Controls - Select Use PIN for Purchases or Password (you will be asked to enter your password) Naturally, its a good idea to keep your password a secret, even from your kids. Please review your devices user manual or contact your device manufacturer for additional information. Note that it is Gamelofts policy to put a cap on in-app purchases to prevent accidental or duplicate purchases."

"A great way to prevent accidental in-app purchases is to require your Amazon password before making any. Just follow these quick steps: - Go to the Amazon Appstore >> Press the Menu Key >> Settings >> Parental Controls - Set Enable Parental Controls to On (youll be asked to enter your existing Amazon password) Naturally, its a good idea to keep your password a secret, even from your kids. Note that it is Gamelofts policy to put a cap on in-app purchases to prevent accidental or duplicate purchases."
Samsung In-App Purchase upgrade required. Do you want to proceed?
Samsung In-App Purchase not installed on this device. Do you want to install?
"The Samsung Store service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app, but you won't be able to make any purchases."
This item was already purchased. It will not be charged to your account.
"Thanks for downloading Gameloft's Games. You have $ trial(s) remaining."
You can play this demo for (TIME).
We are sorry, but you reached the trial limit for this demo. Get the game to enjoy it without restrictions!
This game will cost (PRICE) to purchase
View the Terms and Conditions for each offer:

The full version of this game costs $1. Each SMS message is charged $2 + normal SMS rate (you will need $3 SMS to complete your purchase). You will receive an SMS from $4. Follow the instructions to complete the purchase process. You must have sufficient credit to receive your order. You must be 16 or over to use this service.
Please wait... Purchase from Gameloft in progress.
Operation successful! You will receive an SMS with the PIN code within 5 minutes
Operation successful! You will receive an SMS with the download link within 5 minutes.
The purchase could not be completed. Please make sure that you are connected to a network, your SIM card is defined and you have enough credit.
You bought this game. Do you want to recover the download link?
You bought this game. Do you want to go to Gameloft Wapshop?
Enter the purchase code. Use the left navi key to clear.
Enter the purchase code. Use the $ button to clear.
Please make sure your keyboard is configured to input numbers.
Your game has been unlocked. Please click here to play the full game.
This game is not available for purchase. Please choose another game or try again in a few days.
You must install the data for $ before you continue.
There is a delay in the response from the SMS server. The game will be unlocked later when the server processes the SMS.
You should receive the unlock code within 5 minutes. Check your inbox! You can still play the demo in the meantime! For any problems, please contact android.support@gameloft.com.

"You should receive the unlock message within 5 minutes. Once you've received it, select the notification to unlock the full game. You can still play the demo in the meantime! For any problems, please contact android.support@gameloft.com."
You will try the game for $. Get the game to enjoy it without restrictions!
An SMS will be sent. In order to proceed, the application will be closed. Are you sure?
An SMS will be sent. Do you want to proceed?
"The phone's browser will be opened. In order to proceed, the application will be closed. Are you sure?"
"The phone's browser will be opened. Do you want to proceed?"
Are you sure you want to quit?
Please select your operator to buy the game ([PRICE] + SMS cost)
This game is not supported in landscape mode. Please switch your device back to portrait mode.
This game is not supported in portrait mode. Please switch your device back to landscape mode.
In order to activate this game, please enter the code in the box. 50 SMS / 100 credits. All taxes are included in the price. Confirmation Code: (CODE)
To purchase this game, enter the confirmation code (CODE) in the box.
"If you don't have enough credit, games will be charged by partial payment."

"(PRICE) plus the cost of one standard-rate SMS will be charged to your mobile phone bill or deducted from your prepaid credit. By selecting Buy Now, you confirm that you are over the age of 16 and have the bill payer's permission to make this purchase."

"You should receive the unlock code within 5 minutes. Check your inbox! You can still play the demo in the meantime or you can also restart the purchase process and buy another unlock code by clicking Continue."
This game can only be used on (DEVICE_NAMES).
